meanings.definition: Swallowed greedily or in large amounts.
meanings.sent1: The hungry dog ingurgitated its food in seconds.
meanings.sent2: She ingurgitated the delicious cake at the party.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel ingurgitated the nuts like there was no tomorrow.
meanings.sent4: The river ingurgitated the heavy rain, causing a flood.
meanings.sent5: The vacuum cleaner ingurgitated all the dirt from the carpet.

meanings.definition: Consumed or devoured quickly and eagerly.
meanings.sent1: The ingurgitated sandwich was gone before I knew it.
meanings.sent2: The ingurgitated popcorn disappeared during the movie.
meanings.sent3: The ingurgitated candy vanished from the bowl in minutes.
meanings.sent4: The ingurgitated book was finished in one sitting.
meanings.sent5: The ingurgitated pizza was a hit at the party.
